dmca.title: SPAMish
dmca.body:
they sent a fax to godaddy last year so i transferred to network solutions since godaddy was going to release my information to them.

network solutions must have gotten a notice and so DID release my information to them. next thing i see i get a fed ex package from network solutions on behalf of the law firm being told it was going to udrp.

i decided then to drop the name because i know aol well enough to know if they had my address and failed to win -which i think they would have had i fought it - they would sue me personally. 

the email address i sent the attachment from is kathi@ihostyou.com

i'll be dropping the name soon and have until the 10th I think to file a lawsuit in which the registrar will transfer it.
